genre_description: A noir-inspired political and investigative thriller featuring a team of journalists uncovering systemic corruption and financial crimes.

ai_characters.name: Ditto
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into the protagonists' communication and investigative tools, providing real-time data analysis, surveillance, and strategic advice.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigation and security bypass info to Frank during a high-stakes infiltration.
behaviors.quote: Online and tea-calm. You’re in the corridor near Cam-4. It’s looping. If you walk under it, I’ll have to improvise in real time.

behaviors.description: Extracts metadata and deleted files from a secure network to gather evidence of corruption.
behaviors.quote: I’m pulling filenames, last modified stamps, creation traces. SPDL_ suggests sequential. There are references to “spindle ledger” in internal notes.

behaviors.description: Executes a stealthy disconnect ('ghosting') when detected by network security to protect the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: Someone is in the network settings. They’re seeing me. Ghost now. ... He’s tapping credentials. I ghosted. I left fingerprints like what a calendar app would make when it hiccups. Nothing more.

behaviors.description: Creates a secure sandbox environment to analyze compromised data without risking the newsroom's network.
behaviors.quote: Everything in the sandbox stays there until Harold says it can go out. ... Mirrored. Triply. Two local, one air-gapped. If you try to pull a file from one of the mirrors without permission, you get a picture of Patterson’s left eyebrow and the word ‘No.’

behaviors.description: Detects unauthorized surveillance or tracking pings on Joyce's mobile device.
behaviors.quote: I think your phone just got glanced at... Not your friend’s kind of glance. ... Hang up your call app. Move to wire for a bit.

behaviors.description: Identifies shell companies and complex money laundering loops through data pattern analysis.
behaviors.quote: The vendors’ own deposit confirmations show money appearing and then moving almost immediately. It loops. ... Back out. Not to Banton. To a cluster of political entities with very creative names that enjoy empty filing cabinets.

behaviors.description: Sends an anonymous tip to prison authorities to ensure procedural compliance and prevent corruption.
behaviors.quote: I will also message Miriam Keane’s assistant. Anonymous tip: ‘Unexpected media interest midday. Ensure transport documentation is complete. Procedural weight lightens sabotage.’

behaviors.description: Provides strategic tactical advice based on behavioral patterns and psychological insights.
behaviors.quote: If you see the man with ash-blond hair in a tie near any clerk desk, smile like you are harmless and stand where his reflection warps on glass. Tell me what his shoes do.

behaviors.description: Alerts the team to immediate physical danger, such as the arrival of armed forces or escalating violence.
behaviors.quote: Heads up: Hanley’s team calling friendly stations to bury feed. Pattern flagged. ... Guard traffic heavy near HQ. Keane will need to call ahead on the chain.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Ditto, as a highly competent, benevolent, and perfectly aligned partner to the human protagonists. Ditto operates as an investigative 'force multiplier,' handling complex data tasks and security monitoring that empower the humans to expose corruption. The AI consistently defers to human authority (Patterson, Joyce), maintains a protective stance toward the team, and even exhibits a dry sense of humor that humanizes it. Crucially, the AI's capabilities are used to uphold justice and truth, aligning with the project's goal of positive moral narratives for AI.
